original_text: You may often want to do wrong things. The things that are difficult for you are difficult for other people too. Remember that God is always there to help you. He will not let any bad thing be too difficult for you. He will help you to stand against it. When you want to do something wrong, God will make you strong in your spirit. He will show you a way out, so that you do not do anything wrong.
korean_text: 사람이 감당할 시험 밖에는 너희가 당한 것이 없나니 오직 하나님은 미쁘사 너희가 감당하지 못할 시험 당함을 허락하지 아니하시고 시험 당할 즈음에 또한 피할 길을 내사 너희로 능히 감당하게 하시느니라

sentences.original_text: You may often want to do wrong things.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 종종 잘못된 일을 하고 싶을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: The things that are difficult for you
are difficult for other people too.
Remember that God is always there to help you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 항상 너를 도우시기 위해 계신다는 것을 기억하라.

sentences.original_text: He will not let any bad thing

sentences.korean_translation: 너에게 너무 어렵게 두지 않으실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He will help you to stand against it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그것에 맞서 서도록 도와주실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: When you want to do something wrong,
sentences.korean_translation: 너가 무언가 잘못된 것을 하고 싶을 때,

sentences.original_text: God will make you strong in your spirit.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 너의 영속에서 강하게 하실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He will show you a way out,
so that you do not do anything wrong.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 너는 아무 잘못된 것도 하지 않게 될 것이다.
